ncs__HtbCareerTips: Time spent caring for someone you know also counts as having experience in a caring role.
ncs__CareerPathAndProgression:
You could progress to a more senior role, managing people or services.

As your career develops, you can move on to higher level qualifications, such as a foundation degree, social work degree or Level 5 Diploma in Leadership and Management for Adult Care.
ncs__HtbFurtherInformation: You can find out more about careers in care from Think Care Careers and Social Care TV.
ncs__Description: Care workers help vulnerable people to manage their daily activities and to live as independently as possible.
ncs__WitDigitalSkillsLevel: to be able to carry out basic tasks on a computer or hand-held device
